sentences.en: All you command is an Internet connection and a headset!
sentences.cn: 所有您所做的只要可以上网和一副耳机!

sentences.en: Check that your computer has a microphone and speakers ( or a headset ).
sentences.cn: 检查您的计算机上是否有话筒和扬声器 ( 或头戴式耳机 ).

sentences.en: During the race Mr. Taylor talks to the driver using a headset.
sentences.cn: 在比赛中，泰勒先生用耳麦与车手通话。

sentences.en: Headset ( Top View ) Headset ( Button View )
sentences.cn: 耳机 ( 正面 ) 耳机 ( 背面 )

sentences.en: Headset Indicator LED - Provides a visual cue about headset status.
sentences.cn: 耳机显示灯LED ― ―显示耳机状态.

sentences.en: Is it okay I want you to wear that headset in bed?
sentences.cn: 我想让你今晚戴着这副耳机上床,你不反对 吧 ?

sentences.en: Is it true that using a headset a safer driver?
sentences.cn: 使用免持听筒耳机就真的比较安全 吗 ?

sentences.en: My headset will not enter pairing mode.
sentences.cn: 耳机不能进入配对模式.

sentences.en: Note the large diameter acoustic tubes leading to the operator's headset.
sentences.cn: 注意:大直径声管,导致运营商的耳机.

sentences.en: Sales Production Bluetooth headset, Bluetooth adapter, and other communications products.
sentences.cn: 销售生产蓝牙耳机, 蓝牙适配器等通讯产品.

sentences.en: Should you a hands - free headset?
sentences.cn: 打电话的时候要用耳机 吗 ?

sentences.en: Start with a hands - free headset, which may minimize exposure to radiation.
sentences.cn: 使用无需手持的耳机能使接触辐射量降至最低.

sentences.en: The person being tested listens to sounds a headset.
sentences.cn: 接受测试的人通过耳机听声音.

sentences.en: We are Chinese professional manufacturer for many kinds of headset, earphone, headphone.
sentences.cn: 我们专业生产各种耳机,耳塞, 麦克风, 喇叭,如有需要请联系.

sentences.en: Weightless and stylish, the V 3 Bluetooth headset an accessory of beautiful purpose.
sentences.cn: 失重和时尚, v3蓝牙耳机,是从犯美丽的目的.

sentences.en: Will it replace a headset on a crystal radio?
sentences.cn: 是否会取代晶体收音机一耳机一?

words.tran_cn: 耳机；[电子]头戴式受话器

trans.tran_cn: 戴在头上的耳机或听筒
trans.tran_en: a set of headphones, often with a microphone attached
